document.full_text: radiation fears escalated in japan on friday after workers suffered burns as they tried to cool an earthquake-crippled nuclear plant, while the government sowed confusion over whether it was widening an evacuation zone around the facility.
document.title: radiation fears mount again in japan after plant workers injured
lines_and_colors: radiation fears escalated in japan on friday after workers suffered burns as they tried to cool an earthquake-crippled nuclear plant, while the government sowed confusion over whether it was widening an evacuation zone around the facility.
